title: What is React?
answer_1: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces
right_answer: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

title: What is the main concept behind React?
What does the 'state' represent in a React component?
answer_1: An object that holds data that may change over the lifecycle of a component
right_answer: An object that holds data that may change over the lifecycle of a component

title: Which hook is used to manage state in functional components?
What is the purpose of 'props' in React?
answer_1: To pass data from one component to another
right_answer: To pass data from one component to another

title: What is a higher-order component (HOC)?
answer_1: A function that takes a component and returns a new component
answer_2: A type of state management tool
answer_4: A component that renders other components
right_answer: A function that takes a component and returns a new component
